shot_metadata.name: WINTER_ABSOLUTE
shot_metadata.title: WINTER ABSOLUTE
shot_metadata.narrative_function: Memory terminated | Winter reality | Camera frost ...

progressive_state: Memory terminated | Winter reality | Camera frost 100% | Cut to truth | Watching: The nightmare begins

prompt_variants.subject: Sudden clear image - the house in full winter burial, snow to the roofline, single window glowing yellow, complete silence, then cut to black.
prompt_variants.action: Instant transition from frost to crystal clarity. House buried in snow, only roof and one window visible. Window glows yellow-orange from oil lamp inside. No movement. No sound. Perfect stillness. Hold for exactly 2 seconds. Cut to black.
prompt_variants.scene: House in deep winter. Night. Snow 15 feet deep. Single lit window. Stars visible. No moon.
prompt_variants.style: Wide static shot of buried house (that's where the camera is), perfectly still, hard cut to black.
prompt_variants.camera_position: Wide static shot of buried house
prompt_variants.negative_prompt: no subtitles, no movement, show buried house, single window, hard cut to black, 1080p
